title: Gradient Yellow Background
description: A smooth gradient background transitioning from a bright yellow to a lighter shade, creating a soft and warm visual effect.

title: Gradient Background
description: A smooth gradient background transitioning from white at the center to light yellow at the edges.

title: Risen Dough
description: A close-up image of a bowl filled with risen dough, showcasing its airy and bubbly texture. The dough appears light and fluffy, indicating fermentation, with a smooth surface and a pale color.

title: Variety of Spices
description: An arrangement of various spices displayed in silver spoons. The spices include a vibrant yellow powder, a reddish-brown powder, and a light-colored powder, along with whole peppercorns and a sprig of fresh herbs. The background is white, emphasizing the colors and textures of the spices.

title: Fresh Salad Ingredients
description: An assortment of fresh vegetables and salad ingredients, including lettuce, cucumbers, cherry tomatoes, bell peppers in various colors, red onions, black olives, and cubes of feta cheese, arranged in a dynamic, scattered manner against a white background.
